# 1. Basic clincial characteristics
```{r}
  clinical.table = read.csv(paste0("./data/0_list_processed.csv"))
  colnames(clinical.table)
  mean(clinical.table$Age)
  sd(clinical.table$Age)
  sum(clinical.table$Gender == 1)
  sum(clinical.table$Gender == 2)
  sum(clinical.table$Smoking == 1)
  sum(clinical.table$Smoking == 0)
  for (i in 5:12) {
    print(colnames(clinical.table)[i])
    print(sum(clinical.table[,i] == 1))
    print(sum(clinical.table[,i] == 1)/124)
  }
```
